function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate understanding of SARS-CoV-2 infection mechanism and viral properties.","Impact":"Difficulty in developing effective antiviral interventions and controlling the spread of the virus.","Mitigation":"Conduct detailed analysis at the molecular and disease level to understand the underlying mechanisms.","Technologies":"Advanced molecular analysis and disease modeling technologies.","People":"Researchers, medical professionals, and public health agencies.","Owner":"Research institutions, healthcare organizations, and government agencies."},{"Description":"Multi-organ infection and complications caused by SARS-CoV-2.","Impact":"Increased severity of the disease and unexpected complications in critically ill patients.","Mitigation":"Enhance monitoring and treatment strategies for extra-pulmonary organ infections and associated complications.","Technologies":"Medical imaging, biomarker detection, and multi-organ treatment protocols.","People":"Medical professionals, clinicians, and critically ill patients.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations and medical research institutions."},{"Description":"Increase in T cell apoptosis in COVID-19 patients.","Impact":"Compromised immune response and increased vulnerability to the virus.","Mitigation":"Develop interventions to modulate T cell apoptosis and strengthen the immune response in COVID-19 patients.","Technologies":"Immunomodulatory therapies and immune system monitoring technologies.","People":"Immunologists, clinicians, and COVID-19 patients.","Owner":"Medical research institutions and healthcare organizations."}]}
